actions.name: HTTP Request
actions.title: Publish WF With Long Text in Release Notes (Expected to Fail)

properties.body:
{
  "release_note":"This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.This is description for the release notes length test and its having 1024 length.",
  "name": "Release note Length check",
  "title": "Release note Length check",
  "type": "generic.xchange",
  "blurb": "Release note Length check",
  "workflow_ids": [
    "$activity.definition_activity_02EIC1L4935WY6FFn1cPqVo7BF0sTOUSbmd.output.variable_workflow_01TDNHLQDZ2IU1p9dVTjzl5bO2sJuwTiGUo$"
  ],
  "contact_email": "vspancha@cisco.com",
  "properties": {
    "blurb": "blurb",
    "contact_email": "vspancha@cisco.com",
    "description": "Release note Length check",
    "display_name": "Release note Length check",
    "type_of_submission": "community"
  },
  "type_of_submission": "community"
}
properties.display_name: Publish WF With Long Text in Release Notes (Expected to Fail)

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)

"cat_id1"

properties.name: Delete_Type
properties.description: This is Delete Type , if User want to delete save exchange then type is delete_user from same tenant where it published . if user want to unpublish the exchange then type should be unpublish_user from same tenant where it published. if user want to perform from other xchange manager who is not published then type should be unpublish_global

properties.name: User_XchangeID
properties.description: User_XchangeID is Mandatory when User is deleting the saved document.

properties.name: Provide the Token (Tenant from Where not Published)
